products.name: Bee
products.description: This smiling, little creature is perfect for any bee lover out there.

products.name: Book Cover - Blue
products.description: This blue book cover can hold medium-large sized books. It features a button to clasp shut and keep the books contained.

products.name: Book Cover - Brown
products.description: The brown book cover can contain any small-medium sized books. It's also perfect for small journals! The front features a button to clasp the cover shut.

products.name: Corgi
products.description: A cute corgi plushie is great for anyone who loves dogs, especially corgi lovers!

products.name: Flower Coaster
products.description: My flower coaster is perfect to prevent staining of furniture, and is also a cute decor item to pin up or place on any surface.

products.name: Frog With Mushroom
products.description: This piece features a cute frog holding a mushroom friend. I find this item is perfect for anyone who loves earthly creatures!

products.name: Crochet Top
products.description: Crochet tank top that has a corset back, which can be adjusted, along with adjustable neck ties. Great to wear in the summertime!

products.name: Christmas Tree Ornament
products.description: For Christmas time, my small tree ornament is perfect to set on a Christmas tree. It can also be customized to feature a word or name.

products.name: White Dinosaur
products.description: My dinosaur plushie can sit on any shelf or table, and is great for any lover of prehistoric creatures.

upcoming.name: Butterfly Shoulder Bag
upcoming.description: Perfect shoulder bag to take out for any daytime or nighttime activites. Features cute butterflies, and can be color customizable.

upcoming.name: Fingerless Heart Gloves
upcoming.description: These fingerless heart gloves are perfect for any outfit. They will keep your hands nice and toasty in any cold day.

upcoming.name: Rainbow Sweater
upcoming.description: This rainbow sweater is one of my newest creations. You will find that this rainbow sweater is soft, warm, and cozy.
